main event: Multiple objects observed in the sky displaying erratic maneuvers and flashing lights over Greece on July 25, 1958.
interesting points: Observation lasted for 2-3 minutes, approximately 6-10 objects were seen, the course of the objects was erratic, the sighting could not be identified as known aircraft, reported by multiple locations in Greece.
sighted object: multiple unidentified flying objects with flashing lights
witness description: including a senior construction engineer and his family, and others present on the beach
